title: Celebrities address pupils about issues in schools
text:
RADIO and TV personalities visited schools in Greytown to raise awareness on issues affecting pupils in schools. Some of the issues that were raised at the meeting included teenage pregnancy, safety of the teachers at schools, and bullying.

A crew from Uzalo — a soapie that airs on SABC 1 from Monday to Friday at 8.30pm —lead by Thandeka Dawn King (who plays MaNgcobo) and Ukhozi FM radio personality Zimiphi Biyela addressed pupils at the schools.

Among the schools visited were Qhubinyathi High School, Shede Primary School and Maqhinga High School.
